name: BusinessNetworkMetadata

commentData.description:
Defines the metadata for a BusinessNeworkDefinition. This includes:

 - package.json
 - README.md (optional)

**Applications should retrieve instances from {@link BusinessNetworkDefinition}**

methods.name: getREADME

commentData.description: Returns the README.md for this business network. This may be null if the business network does not have a README.md

tags.title: return
tags.description: the README.md file for the business network or null

description: Returns the README.md for this business network. This may be null if the business network does not have a README.md
the README.md file for the business network or null

methods.name: getPackageJson

commentData.description: Returns the package.json for this business network.

description: Returns the package.json for this business network.

methods.name: getName

commentData.description: Returns the name for this business network.

tags.title: return
tags.description: the name of the business network

description: Returns the name for this business network.
the name of the business network

methods.summary: Returns the name for this business network

methods.name: getDescription

commentData.description: Returns the description for this business network.

tags.title: return
tags.description: the description of the business network

description: Returns the description for this business network.
the description of the business network

methods.summary: Returns the description for this business network

methods.name: getVersion

commentData.description: Returns the version for this business network.

tags.description: the description of the business network

methods.name: getIdentifier

commentData.description: Returns the identifier for this business network. Formed from name@version.
